data.name: ItemBackpack1
data.value: Backpack of lack

data.name: ItemBackpack1Short
data.value: Being a completionist is a virtue!

data.name: ItemBackpack1Long
data.value: Picking up an item for the first time (including this one) heals you for 1 point.

data.name: ItemBackpack2
data.value: Lute

data.name: ItemBackpack2Short
data.value: Traveling musicians bump into easy money a lot.

data.name: ItemBackpack2Long
data.value: +50 luck for influencing the amount found when picking up gold.

data.name: ItemBackpack3
data.value: Wheelbarrow

data.name: ItemBackpack3Short
data.value: It is a breeze to carry your heavy platings in it.

data.name: ItemBackpack3Long
data.value: +100% bonus to permanent defense pickups (maximum 5 times).

data.name: ItemBackpack4
data.value: Cooking pot

data.name: ItemBackpack4Short
data.value: Cook your food, so you will have reserves for the journey home.

data.name: ItemBackpack4Long
data.value: +1 to permanent attack and vitality bonus pickups (maximum 6 times).

data.name: ItemBackpack5
data.value: Travel bundle

data.name: ItemBackpack5Short
data.value: If you travel far enough, you will run into goods.

data.name: ItemBackpack5Long
data.value: Every dungeon level will have +1 extra pickup.

data.name: ItemCape1
data.value: Naturewalker tabard

data.name: ItemCape1Short
data.value: Ease of movement from a durable cloth.

data.name: ItemCape1Long
data.value: Extra speed and defense bonus at the same time.

data.name: ItemCape2
data.value: High collar vampire cloak

data.name: ItemCape2Desc
data.value: High collar vampire cloak
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemCape2Short
data.value: Blood is now a refreshing beverage.

data.name: ItemCape2Long
data.value: 33% chance to steal 1 health when inflicting damage (only 10% against undead).

data.name: ItemCape3
data.value: Lich robe

data.name: ItemCape3Short
data.value: Each kill fuels your might.

data.name: ItemCape3Long
data.value: +1 vitality for every three monster killed (maximum +10), while wearing the robe.

data.name: ItemCape4
data.value: Wizard mantle

data.name: ItemCape4Short
data.value: Just as a powerful wizard, control your own faith!

data.name: ItemCape4Long
data.value: +100% bonus to all of your luck trials.

data.name: ItemCape5
data.value: Royal cape

data.name: ItemCape5Short
data.value: Each revealed chest raises the fortune of a king.

data.name: ItemCape5Long
data.value: +1 permanent luck bonus every time you open a chest (maximum +10).

data.name: ItemOffHand1
data.value: Crescent moon buckler

data.name: ItemOffHand1Short
data.value: No attacking monster can escape divine retribution.

data.name: ItemOffHand1Long
data.value: 200% of the suffered damage is reflected. Immune to interrupts.

data.name: ItemOffHand2
data.value: Parrying dagger

data.name: ItemOffHand2Short
data.value: The best defense is a good offense.

data.name: ItemOffHand2Long
data.value: 15% chance to use your defense value as an attack bonus when striking.

data.name: ItemOffHand3
data.value: Banal valor shield

data.name: ItemOffHand3Short
data.value: As banal defense bonus as it can get.

data.name: ItemOffHand3Long
data.value: Good protection at the cost of a small speed loss.

data.name: ItemOffHand4
data.value: Fortune-teller's orb

data.name: ItemOffHand4Short
data.value: It may bring good luck, or it may not...

data.name: ItemOffHand4Long
data.value: +5 bonus for every luck trial.

data.name: ItemOffHand5
data.value: Royal aegis

data.name: ItemOffHand5Short
data.value: Some say gold is evil, but it can protect you from evil just as much.

data.name: ItemOffHand5Long
data.value: +1% defense bonus for every 5 gold you own (maximum +50%).

data.name: ItemForearms1
data.value: Regular vambrace

data.name: ItemForearms1Short
data.value: The defense bonus is regular too.

data.name: ItemForearms1Long
data.value: Moderate defense and a tiny attack bonus, for lesser speed in exchange.

data.name: ItemForearms2
data.value: Rapid crossbow

data.name: ItemForearms2Short
data.value: Hidden tricks for a coup de grâce.

data.name: ItemForearms2Long
data.value: Quadrupled attack value against enemies having 50% or less of their maximum health.

data.name: ItemForearms3
data.value: Hidden dagger

data.name: ItemForearms3Short
data.value: A well-timed strike is critical.

data.name: ItemForearms3Long
data.value: Every attack against fully healed enemies will be a critical strike.

data.name: ItemForearms4
data.value: Barbarian bracer

data.name: ItemForearms4Short
data.value: Break the defense of your opponents.

data.name: ItemForearms4Long
data.value: Permanently reduce the defense of a creature by 33% and 5% chance to interrupt on hit.

data.name: ItemForearms5
data.value: Sleeve gun

data.name: ItemForearms5Short
data.value: Little extra firepower during battle.

data.name: ItemForearms5Long
data.value: 100% bonus value to every fourth attack of yours.

data.name: ItemHead1
data.value: Wizard hat

data.name: ItemHead1Short
data.value: A clear mind can withstand all illusions.

data.name: ItemHead1Long
data.value: Dissolves all the hallucinations immediately beside the luck bonus.

data.name: ItemHead2
data.value: Necromancer's headgear

data.name: ItemHead2Short
data.value: Smells funky, but monsters mistake you for the lord of death!

data.name: ItemHead2Long
data.value: 33% chance to scare the monsters in the dungeon, when you kill an enemy.

data.name: ItemHead3
data.value: Wolf head

data.name: ItemHead3Short
data.value: Powerful shamanic totem with a tiny downside (are you high?).

data.name: ItemHead3Long
data.value: One monster in each dungeon will be a hallucination.

data.name: ItemHead4
data.value: Royal crown

data.name: ItemHead4Short
data.value: For a king, chests open their mysteries for less gold.

data.name: ItemHead4Long
data.value: Opening a chest costs 10 gold less.

data.name: ItemHead5
data.value: Ordinary great helm

data.name: ItemHead5Short
data.value: Comes with ordinary defense and slightly reduced sight.

data.name: ItemHead5Long
data.value: 5% of your attacks miss their target due to your reduced sight.

data.name: ItemPants1
data.value: Commonplace armor pants

data.name: ItemPants1Desc
data.value: Commonplace armor pants
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemPants1Short
data.value: Commonplace protection against attacks.

data.name: ItemPants1Long
data.value: Huge defense bonus, but restrained movement.

data.name: ItemPants2
data.value: Trekker leather pants

data.name: ItemPants2Desc
data.value: Trekker leather pants
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemPants2Short
data.value: Ensures free movement.

data.name: ItemPants2Long
data.value: 5% chance to dodge all incoming attacks.

data.name: ItemPants3
data.value: Mawashi (sumo pants)

data.name: ItemPants3Desc
data.value: Mawashi (sumo pants)
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemPants3Short
data.value: Meet the immovable, tough and healthful.

data.name: ItemPants3Long
data.value: 25% of your vitality also counts as attack. Immune to interrupts.

data.name: ItemPants4
data.value: Rubber duck swim ring

data.name: ItemPants4Desc
data.value: Rubber duck swim ring
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemPants4Short
data.value: Beating your head against the wall may actually lead to something...

data.name: ItemPants4Long
data.value: Phase through thin walls after hitting them a few times, if the target is clear.

data.name: ItemPants5
data.value: Fig leaf

data.name: ItemPants5Short
data.value: Monsters astonished by your pants, or the lack of, forget to strike.

data.name: ItemPants5Long
data.value: Always initiate in battles regardless of your speed.

data.name: ItemShoulders1
data.value: Rhino shoulder blades

data.name: ItemShoulders1Desc
data.value: Rhino shoulder blades
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemShoulders1Short
data.value: Careful it is pointy, it could easily hurt anyone touching it!

data.name: ItemShoulders1Long
data.value: When hit 5 points of damage is reflected to the striking enemy.

data.name: ItemShoulders2
data.value: Pirate's crafty parrot

data.name: ItemShoulders2Short
data.value: Helps with gold looting, just like it did for its previous owner.

data.name: ItemShoulders2Long
data.value: +3 gold found every time you loot a monster.

data.name: ItemShoulders3
data.value: Uninspired shoulder plate

data.name: ItemShoulders3Desc
data.value: Uninspired shoulder plate
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemShoulders3Short
data.value: Grants uninspired armor bonus.

data.name: ItemShoulders3Long
data.value: Uninspired armor bonus, nothing more.

data.name: ItemShoulders4
data.value: Leather pauldron

data.name: ItemShoulders4Short
data.value: Stay nimble even under enduring protection.

data.name: ItemShoulders4Long
data.value: +25% speed for your initiative trials besides the protection bonus.

data.name: ItemShoulders5
data.value: Shoulder cannon

data.name: ItemShoulders5Short
data.value: Though an effective weapon, it does not shoot plasma blasts.

data.name: ItemShoulders5Long
data.value: Whenever you hit a target, randomly blasts a monster in the dungeon for 7 damage.

data.name: ItemNecklace1
data.value: Heavy cross necklace

data.name: ItemNecklace1Short
data.value: They should have stayed dead!

data.name: ItemNecklace1Long
data.value: +33% attack bonus and 5% critical strike chance against undead and resurrected creatures.

data.name: ItemNecklace2
data.value: Mana vial

data.name: ItemNecklace2Short
data.value: Heavenly energy influencing your endurance.

data.name: ItemNecklace2Long
data.value: Heals you for 4 points the first time you pick it up.

data.name: ItemNecklace3
data.value: Velocity claw necklace

data.name: ItemNecklace3Short
data.value: Claws of a ferocious beast from another realm gives hunter instincts.

data.name: ItemNecklace3Long
data.value: Grants as much critical strike chance as your speed value.

data.name: ItemNecklace4
data.value: Gold digger's chain

data.name: ItemNecklace4Short
data.value: I came to find gold, not to fight monstrosities.

data.name: ItemNecklace4Long
data.value: Heals you for 1 health point when picking up gold.

data.name: ItemNecklace5
data.value: Ring-maker's silver fist necklace

data.name: ItemNecklace5Desc
data.value: Ring-maker's silver fist necklace

data.name: ItemNecklace5Short
data.value: Belonged to an unlucky smith. Could help with precious metal gathering.

data.name: ItemNecklace5Long
data.value: +10 gold gained for defense bonus pickups, but reduces your defense by 10%.

data.name: ItemScarf1
data.value: Hangman's favorite

data.name: ItemScarf1Short
data.value: You may survive a deadly blow with only an aching neck.

data.name: ItemScarf1Long
data.value: 50% chance of nullifying damage suffered from a hit if it would be deadly.

data.name: ItemScarf2
data.value: Airman scarf

data.name: ItemScarf2Short
data.value: Bold and fearless like a real hero.

data.name: ItemScarf2Long
data.value: Immunity to fear besides the speed and luck bonuses.

data.name: ItemScarf3
data.value: Don't say its name three times

data.name: ItemScarf3Short
data.value: I venture someplace scary, turning loose something ghastly!

data.name: ItemScarf3Long
data.value: Saves you from 3 deadly hits, but you won't thank it for the third time!

data.name: ItemScarf4
data.value: Monk cowl

data.name: ItemScarf4Short
data.value: The monastery cook makes the most out of the ingredients available.

data.name: ItemScarf4Long
data.value: Vitality pickups heal you for 1 to 3 extra points.

data.name: ItemScarf5
data.value: Red bow tie

data.name: ItemScarf5Short
data.value: A real gentleman maintains his elegance even during battle.

data.name: ItemScarf5Long
data.value: +1% chance to dodge incoming attacks for every 2 points of speed value.

data.name: ItemRing1
data.value: Engagement ring

data.name: ItemRing1Short
data.value: This is going to cost you a lot for the rest of my life.

data.name: ItemRing1Long
data.value: 1 less gold found every time you pick up gold or loot a monster.

data.name: ItemRing2
data.value: Insignificant ring

data.name: ItemRing2Short
data.value: Don't let its name fool you, it could change things for the better.

data.name: ItemRing2Long
data.value: In case of a tie on initiative you will start the battle.

data.name: ItemRing3
data.value: Golden knuckles

data.name: ItemRing3Short
data.value: The more money you have the more powerful you are.

data.name: ItemRing3Long
data.value: +1 attack for every 10 gold you own (maximum +10).

data.name: ItemRing4
data.value: Blood-finger claw

data.name: ItemRing4Short
data.value: Critical strikes heal you.

data.name: ItemRing4Long
data.value: 1 health point retrieved when you deliver a critical strike.

data.name: ItemRing5
data.value: Finger traps

data.name: ItemRing5Short
data.value: How unfortunate, your trapped victims don't know how to relax.

data.name: ItemRing5Long
data.value: Reduces the attack power of your enemies by 3 on each successful hit.

data.name: ItemFeet1
data.value: Wanderer leather boots

data.name: ItemFeet1Desc
data.value: Wanderer leather boots
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemFeet1Short
data.value: Be swift even on hard terrain.

data.name: ItemFeet1Long
data.value: 5% chance to dodge an attack besides the speed bonus.

data.name: ItemFeet2
data.value: Geta (samurai sandal)

data.name: ItemFeet2Desc
data.value: Geta (samurai sandal)
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemFeet2Short
data.value: Footwear to fight effectively.

data.name: ItemFeet2Long
data.value: 33% chance to land another quick jab after a successful hit.

data.name: ItemFeet3
data.value: Unnoteworthy greaves

data.name: ItemFeet3Short
data.value: Feels heavy, shields well though!

data.name: ItemFeet3Long
data.value: Reduces your speed by 10% for initiative trials.

data.name: ItemFeet4
data.value: Gambler pirate's peg leg

data.name: ItemFeet4Desc
data.value: Gambler pirate's peg leg
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemFeet4Short
data.value: Win big or lose it all at the market.

data.name: ItemFeet4Long
data.value: Pay only 50% of the item cost at the market, but have 1 less choice.

data.name: ItemFeet5
data.value: Zombie blood tainted socks

data.name: ItemFeet5Short
data.value: Keeps your body parts together even after huge strikes.

data.name: ItemFeet5Long
data.value: May heal up to 3 points when you are under 50% health and suffer damage.

data.name: ItemHands1
data.value: Frenzied policeman's biker gloves

data.name: ItemHands1Short
data.value: 100% SNAFU

data.name: ItemHands1Long
data.value: Interrupt immunity and attribute bonuses for reduced defense.

data.name: ItemHands2
data.value: Medical gloves

data.name: ItemHands2Short
data.value: Near immunity to poison and better coping with injury.

data.name: ItemHands2Long
data.value: 50% poison damage reduction and damage suffered above 5 points are nullified.

data.name: ItemHands3
data.value: Foresters gloves

data.name: ItemHands3Short
data.value: Frees your hands and sharpens your attacks.

data.name: ItemHands3Long
data.value: 10% critical strike chance besides the attack and speed bonus.

data.name: ItemHands4
data.value: Boxing gloves

data.name: ItemHands4Short
data.value: Interrupt your opponents in battle.

data.name: ItemHands4Long
data.value: 25% chance to interrupt your opponent when you attack first in battle.

data.name: ItemHands5
data.value: Dull gauntlets

data.name: ItemHands5Short
data.value: Dull on multiple levels, yet shields well and hits hard.

data.name: ItemHands5Long
data.value: Increases both your attack and defense values, but reduces your speed.

data.name: ItemPocket1
data.value: Magician's ace of clubs

data.name: ItemPocket1Desc
data.value: Magician's ace of clubs
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemPocket1Short
data.value: Grants a keen eye for rare artifacts.

data.name: ItemPocket1Long
data.value: +66 luck for finding better artifacts scattered around the dungeon and in chests.

data.name: ItemPocket2
data.value: Buzzard feather

data.name: ItemPocket2Short
data.value: Looks like the owner of this dungeon has lost a precious artifact.

data.name: ItemPocket2Long
data.value: +6 attack bonus against were, giant, mutant and avian creatures.

data.name: ItemPocket3
data.value: Prayer book

data.name: ItemPocket3Short
data.value: A prayer could turn poison into wine?!

data.name: ItemPocket3Long
data.value: +33 luck for a better chance of finding unknown potions with a positive effect.

data.name: ItemPocket4
data.value: Accustomed spell scroll

data.name: ItemPocket4Desc
data.value: Accustomed spell scroll
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemPocket4Short
data.value: Instructions: chant when drinking an elixir...

data.name: ItemPocket4Long
data.value: +50 luck for affecting the healing power of health potions.

data.name: ItemPocket5
data.value: Skeleton key

data.name: ItemPocket5Short
data.value: Only half the hassle to open a chest.

data.name: ItemPocket5Long
data.value: Chest costs reduced by 50%.

data.name: ItemChest1
data.value: Boring breastplate

data.name: ItemChest1Short
data.value: Armed with boring defense bonus.

data.name: ItemChest1Long
data.value: +10% to your final defense value, but slows you down a little.

data.name: ItemChest2
data.value: Cardboard box

data.name: ItemChest2Short
data.value: High chance to evade when no one knows exactly where to strike.

data.name: ItemChest2Long
data.value: 20% chance to dodge all incoming attacks.

data.name: ItemChest3
data.value: Mad man's leather jacket

data.name: ItemChest3Desc
data.value: Mad man's leather jacket
data.comment: This name is formated for the book menu screens.

data.name: ItemChest3Short
data.value: Terminal craze with a bronze badge that says "One of the good guys".

data.name: ItemChest3Long
data.value: Attack and speed bonus with a major defense penalty.

data.name: ItemChest4
data.value: Giant beetle carapace

data.name: ItemChest4Short
data.value: Renders its healthy wearer nearly invulnerable.

data.name: ItemChest4Long
data.value: +10 defense bonus if you have 50% or more of your maximum health.

data.name: ItemChest5
data.value: Straitjacket

data.name: ItemChest5Short
data.value: Show no fear, no emotion, rush into battle like a crazy person!

data.name: ItemChest5Long
data.value: Immunity to fear. Immunity to interrupts. +25% attack and speed bonus.

data.name: ItemCompanion1
data.value: Bear

data.name: ItemCompanion1Short
data.value: Pain is a little more bearable.

data.name: ItemCompanion1Long
data.value: 1 damage reduced from the final damage suffered on top of your defense.

data.name: ItemCompanion2
data.value: Mosquito in amber

data.name: ItemCompanion2Short
data.value: Legends tell of a lost world it could resurrect.

data.name: ItemCompanion2Long
data.value: Resurrects you upon death, replenishing 100% of your health, but only once!

data.name: ItemCompanion3
data.value: Snail

data.name: ItemCompanion3Short
data.value: Slow critter filling your heart with warmth.

data.name: ItemCompanion3Long
data.value: Heals you for 25% of your maximum health when reaching the next dungeon.

data.name: ItemCompanion4
data.value: Dragon egg

data.name: ItemCompanion4Short
data.value: A green breed with a long tongue, devouring enemies.

data.name: ItemCompanion4Long
data.value: Heals you for 1 health point when you kill a monster.

data.name: ItemCompanion5
data.value: Fairy fungus

data.name: ItemCompanion5Short
data.value: Grows over all of your stuff, even you too...

data.name: ItemCompanion5Long
data.value: +1 permanent defense bonus when reaching the next dungeon (maximum +7).

data.name: ItemPouch1
data.value: Leprechaun's sack

data.name: ItemPouch1Short
data.value: A whole spectrum of gold, like a rainbow!

data.name: ItemPouch1Long
data.value: +1 luck for every 5 gold you own (maximum +10).

data.name: ItemPouch2
data.value: Ancient briefcase

data.name: ItemPouch2Short
data.value: One can always find hidden money in old pockets.

data.name: ItemPouch2Long
data.value: +1 gold found every time you pick up gold or loot a monster.

data.name: ItemPouch3
data.value: Mimic pouch

data.name: ItemPouch3Short
data.value: A horrific, but handy creature for battle.

data.name: ItemPouch3Long
data.value: 5% chance to intimidate a monster on a successful hit, leaving it in fear.

data.name: ItemPouch4
data.value: Leather flask

data.name: ItemPouch4Short
data.value: Can be filled with beverages found in chests.

data.name: ItemPouch4Long
data.value: Heals you for 1 health point when you open a chest.

data.name: ItemPouch5
data.value: Hulu (Bottle gourd)

data.name: ItemPouch5Short
data.value: Transforms every beverage into panacea.

data.name: ItemPouch5Long
data.value: 50% more health points gained when drinking health potions.

data.name: ItemFace1
data.value: Pirate's eyepatch

data.name: ItemFace1Short
data.value: Pirates love to haggle!

data.name: ItemFace1Long
data.value: Buying something in the market costs 15 gold less.

data.name: ItemFace2
data.value: Spyglass

data.name: ItemFace2Short
data.value: Reveals the true stance of the monsters.

data.name: ItemFace2Long
data.value: Health bars of the monsters are visible when equipped and reveals hallucinations.

data.name: ItemFace3
data.value: Red tie

data.name: ItemFace3Short
data.value: Tying it on your forehead makes you stronger.

data.name: ItemFace3Long
data.value: The attack and speed bonuses of the tie are doubled when you are under 50% health.

data.name: ItemFace4
data.value: Carnival mask

data.name: ItemFace4Short
data.value: Imbued with dark magic, blurs the line between reality and imagination.

data.name: ItemFace4Long
data.value: 25% chance of turning a random monster into a hallucination whenever you kill an enemy.

data.name: ItemFace5
data.value: Creepy bandana

data.name: ItemFace5Short
data.value: Petrifies your enemies.

data.name: ItemFace5Long
data.value: 33% chance to scare your enemies at the start of a battle, skipping their next attack due to fear.

data.name: ItemWaist1
data.value: Usual belt

data.name: ItemWaist1Short
data.value: A sturdy belt, nothing unusual.

data.name: ItemWaist1Long
data.value: Grants 2 health points the first time you pick it up.

data.name: ItemWaist2
data.value: Super mega-belt

data.name: ItemWaist2Short
data.value: Everything is better when it's prefixed by super! Same goes for mega.

data.name: ItemWaist2Long
data.value: +1 more health point gained when drinking health potions.

data.name: ItemWaist3
data.value: Champion's belt

data.name: ItemWaist3Short
data.value: How hard can you get hit?

data.name: ItemWaist3Long
data.value: Replenishes 25% of your health after every fifth monster you killed.

data.name: ItemWaist4
data.value: Utility belt

data.name: ItemWaist4Short
data.value: Have something for every situation.

data.name: ItemWaist4Long
data.value: 5% chance to strike a critical hit. 2% chance to dodge incoming attacks.

data.name: ItemWaist5
data.value: Lenymn's red sash

data.name: ItemWaist5Short
data.value: Who the hell is Lenymn and why is the sash red, why not green?!

data.name: ItemWaist5Long
data.value: +25% speed bonus to your initiative trials.

data.name: ItemBracelet1
data.value: Shackles

data.name: ItemBracelet1Short
data.value: Slows monsters.

data.name: ItemBracelet1Long
data.value: Permanently reduces the speed of monsters to 0 when hitting them.

data.name: ItemBracelet2
data.value: Rainbow arm band

data.name: ItemBracelet2Short
data.value: Diversity adds richness.

data.name: ItemBracelet2Long
data.value: +1 to all your attributes.

data.name: ItemBracelet3
data.value: Brass charm bracelet

data.name: ItemBracelet3Short
data.value: Lucky charm and a warrior's adornment in one.

data.name: ItemBracelet3Long
data.value: +25 luck for influencing the amount found when you loot a monster.

data.name: ItemBracelet4
data.value: Sundial watch

data.name: ItemBracelet4Short
data.value: It can not even measure time without sunlight, but can it skew it bit?

data.name: ItemBracelet4Long
data.value: 10% chance of bending time and nullifying the damage suffered from a hit.

data.name: ItemBracelet5
data.value: Stocks

data.name: ItemBracelet5Short
data.value: Not too helpful in a fight, but it is surprisingly sturdy.

data.name: ItemBracelet5Long
data.value: Immunity to interrupts and a huge defense bonus for reduced attack and speed.

data.name: ItemMainHand1
data.value: Sword of mediocrity

data.name: ItemMainHand1Short
data.value: At least it is sharp...

data.name: ItemMainHand1Long
data.value: Significant attack bonus.

data.name: ItemMainHand2
data.value: Mace blunt

data.name: ItemMainHand2Short
data.value: Its shaft is brilliant, its head is pure (steel).

data.name: ItemMainHand2Long
data.value: +50% bonus to your final attack value.

data.name: ItemMainHand3
data.value: Rusty axe

data.name: ItemMainHand3Short
data.value: Leaves a nasty wide open wound.

data.name: ItemMainHand3Long
data.value: Permanently reduces the vitality of a damaged creature by 30%.

data.name: ItemMainHand4
data.value: Risk of pain

data.name: ItemMainHand4Short
data.value: Nunchucks are versatile, but beware, you can hurt yourself.

data.name: ItemMainHand4Long
data.value: 50% critical strike chance, but 10% chance to hit yourself for 3 points.

data.name: ItemMainHand5
data.value: Thunder mallet

data.name: ItemMainHand5Short
data.value: Lightning strike inside the dungeon! What in the world?

data.name: ItemMainHand5Long
data.value: When hitting a monster lightning will strike every enemy in the dungeon damaging 1 point.

data.name: ItemPocket6
data.value: Lost raven feather

data.name: ItemPocket6Short
data.value: In exchange for it, squeeze out extra merchandise from its owner.

data.name: ItemPocket6Long
data.value: 1 extra choice in the black raven market.

data.name: ItemMainHand6
data.value: Dao dual swords

data.name: ItemMainHand6Short
data.value: Don't think of them as separate. They're two halves of a single weapon.

data.name: ItemMainHand6Long
data.value: 25% chance to land another quick jab when attacking.

data.name: ItemPouch6
data.value: Antidote potion

data.name: ItemPouch6Short
data.value: Poison?! Nah, it's called vodka...

data.name: ItemPouch6Long
data.value: Nullifies damage suffered from poisoning and neutralizes hallucinogens.

data.name: ItemOffHand6
data.value: Toxin dagger

data.name: ItemOffHand6Short
data.value: Don't breathe the toxic gas!

data.name: ItemOffHand6Long
data.value: When killing a monster toxic gases will poison every enemy in the dungeon damaging 3 points.

data.name: ItemHead6
data.value: Pumpkin helmet

data.name: ItemHead6Short
data.value: Said the Raven, in fear shaking, shrieking, "Nevermore".

data.name: ItemHead6Long
data.value: You can buy multiple pickups or items in the shop, not only one.

data.name: ItemChest6
data.value: Red shirt

data.name: ItemChest6Short
data.value: Rank: Security officer. Emergency call: "Beam me up".

data.name: ItemChest6Long
data.value: Has 20% chance to save you from death by teleporting to a nearby location.

data.name: ItemCompanion6
data.value: Hedgehog familiar

data.name: ItemCompanion6Short
data.value: Fast, blue and sturdy follower, but loses gold every time when hurt.

data.name: ItemCompanion6Long
data.value: When hit 1 damage is reflected to the striking enemy, but also 1 gold gets lost.

data.name: ItemFace6
data.value: Unic(h)orn

data.name: ItemFace6Short
data.value: Attach it to your forehead to experience power level over 9000.

data.name: ItemFace6Long
data.value: 1% chance to deliver 9001 damage when hitting lesser beings (boss excluded).

data.name: ItemShoulders6
data.value: Shoulder pads

data.name: ItemShoulders6Short
data.value: Quarterback, lead the offense from a defensive position!

data.name: ItemShoulders6Long
data.value: 25% of your defense also counts as attack.

data.name: ItemBackpack6
data.value: Identity disc

data.name: ItemBackpack6Short
data.value: Here goes something; here comes nothing!

data.name: ItemBackpack6Long
data.value: 20% chance to phase through enemies when hitting them, if the target is clear.

data.name: ItemHands6
data.value: Pickaxe gloves

data.name: ItemHands6Short
data.value: And the new title is "I Am OverCraft"

data.name: ItemHands6Long
data.value: Hitting a dungeon wall a few times destroys it (maximum 10 uses).

data.name: ItemWaist6
data.value: Tool belt

data.name: ItemWaist6Short
data.value: It is so infuriating that chests block the way...

data.name: ItemWaist6Long
data.value: You can take apart opened chests.

data.name: ItemNecklace6
data.value: Snake eyes pendant

data.name: ItemNecklace6Short
data.value: Don't look in it's eyes!

data.name: ItemNecklace6Long
data.value: 30% chance to scare the monsters in the dungeon, when entering a floor.

data.name: ItemRing6
data.value: Wishbone ring

data.name: ItemRing6Short
data.value: Even parts of dead birds have great power in this dungeon.

data.name: ItemRing6Long
data.value: A randomly selected chest will be opened for free (maximum 5), when entering a floor.

data.name: ItemFeet6
data.value: Crutch and leg cast

data.name: ItemFeet6Short
data.value: Think about the possibilities: priority seat on public transport!

data.name: ItemFeet6Long
data.value: Heals you 1 point, when entering a dungeon floor.

data.name: ItemForearms6
data.value: Grappling hook

data.name: ItemForearms6Short
data.value: Worm platoon, do 10 push ups and the Indian rope trick!

data.name: ItemForearms6Long
data.value: 8% chance to jump over enemies when hitting them, if the target is clear.

data.name: ItemCape6
data.value: Frostborn hood

data.name: ItemCape6Short
data.value: Sacred relic of the frostborn mongers.

data.name: ItemCape6Long
data.value: Damages monsters for 1 point and reduces their speed to 0 when killing an enemy.

data.name: ItemNecklace7
data.value: Cyclops eye

data.name: ItemNecklace7Short
data.value: Not the one with the X gene, but the monster. Or maybe it is?!

data.name: ItemNecklace7Long
data.value: Shots a death ray on every third strike damaging for 100% of your attack value.

data.name: ItemScarf6
data.value: Overcharged scarf

data.name: ItemScarf6Short
data.value: What happens when a magic scarf gets static?

data.name: ItemScarf6Long
data.value: On every hit lightning strikes 3 nearby monsters damaging for 20% of your attack.

data.name: ItemBracelet6
data.value: Gemstone wristlet

data.name: ItemBracelet6Short
data.value: Brilliance, carved from the crystalline depths.

data.name: ItemBracelet6Long
data.value: +4 to all your attributes.

data.name: ItemPants6
data.value: Gladiator pteruges

data.name: ItemPants6Short
data.value: Came for the protection, but stayed due to swiftness.

data.name: ItemPants6Long
data.value: 50% chance to increase your defense and speed in a battle by 2.

data.name: ItemMainHand7
data.value: Flail of failure

data.name: ItemMainHand7Short
data.value: Failure is inevitable. Get used to it and build on it!

data.name: ItemMainHand7Long
data.value: 5% of your strikes miss their target, but adds 1 to 4 to your attack in a battle.
